brief: This command deletes a DHCPv6 option definition from the configuration database.
cmd-comment: This command includes a list with exactly one option definition specification, comprising an option name and code. The ``server-tags`` list is mandatory and must contain exactly one server tag. Specifying an empty list, a value of ``null``, or multiple server tags will result in an error.
cmd-syntax: <specification of the database to connect to>
name: remote-option-def6-del
